DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare stone clearance rate treat different drug ESWL urinary calculus , These drug often use urinary calculus , progesterone , tamsulosin , propantheline Bromide nifedipine.In study investigator want investigate different effect drug use treat urinary calculus ESWL .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Therapeutic Effect Treated With Tamsulosin Progesterone After ESWL ( Extra Corporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy ) Urinary Calculus
DOC.detailed_description: There 4 group investigation , group1 urinary calculus treat ESWL , group2 urinary calculus treat ESWL tamsulosin , group3 urinary calculus treat ESWL progesterone , group4 urinary calculus treat ESWL , propantheline Bromide nifedipine.We want investigate one good urinary calculus treat ESWL .
DOC.criteria: From 18 year old 68 year old , urinary calculus could treat ESWL , calculus size 425mm Less 18 year old 68 year old , calculus size Less than4 large 25mm
